name: Out of Steam VR
description:
You are stranded in an asteroid field with your steam-powered ship. Use your hands to move around and collect important resources to repair your spaceship.

Controlls

ButtonsFunctionsGrab-ButtonPickup, MovearoundJoystick
Turn 45°A, X (Primary Button)Reset Player to shipLeft/Right TriggerShoot steam from your hand
